item.title: Side shoots on tree & Cleaning at base of tr, 4th July
item.description:
I have noticed for a while now the road sweepers always avoid sweeping by this tree and bike hanger. This morning the sweeper by passed this section. I often clean this area as it is outside my house. The side shoots on the tree needs to be cut back.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rushmore Road, Hackney, London

item.title: No drop kerb, 4th July
item.description:

item.title: House hold rubbish, 4th July
item.description:
I reported an issue on Tuesday and that's been cleared (thank you) only tk be replaced yet again. Multiple bags blocking to pavement and food waste is now spilt all across the pavement. This has been an on going issue for months. Thanks for your working in quickly cleaning and can a long term solution be found.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Osborn Terrace, Horn Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
